home.title: Space Adventure Memory Game
home.subtitle: Start your space memory journey
home.help_content:
Welcome to Space Adventure Memory Game!

Game Rules:
1. Click on cards to flip them
2. Find matching pairs of cards
3. Complete all pairs within the time limit

Good luck, little astronaut!

difficulty.title: Choose Your Adventure Mode
difficulty.subtitle: Different space journey experiences
difficulty.help_content:
Each difficulty level has different game time and number of pairs:
Explore Mode: 120 seconds, suitable for beginners
Adventure Mode: 90 seconds, balanced game experience
Challenge Mode: 60 seconds, requires fast reactions

explore_mode.title: Explore Mode
explore_mode.description: Perfect for ages 5-7, with plenty of time to explore space!

adventure_mode.title: Adventure Mode
adventure_mode.description: Great for ages 7-9, enjoy an exciting space adventure!

challenge_mode.title: Challenge Mode
challenge_mode.description: For ages 9-10, show your space exploration skills!
